mapper.select: select mycp_idx,fk_cpcode,cpname,cpexpire,dcmoney,fk_userid,usedate from myCoupon A join coupon B on A.fk_cpcode = B.cpcode where fk_userid=#{loginuser} order by mycp_idx

select userid,username,pwd,email,phone,post,addr,detailaddr ,gender,to_char(birthday,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS birthday,introduction,memberstatus,profileimg,warncount,regdate from member where memberstatus =1 and userid = #{loginuser}

select A.userid AS userid ,username,email,phone,B.rsvcode AS rsvcode,C.roomcode AS roomcode,guestcount ,babycount,rsv_name,rsv_phone,rsv_name,rsv_email, to_char(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rsv_checkindate, substr(rsv_checkindate,7,2) AS checkInDD, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,0,2) AS checkInYY, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,4,2) AS checkInMM, to_char(rsv_checkindate, 'DY' ) AS checkInDay, to_char(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rsv_checkoutdate, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,7,2) AS checkOutDD, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,0,2) AS checkOutYY, substr(rsv_checkoutdate,4,2) AS checkOutMM, to_char(rsv_checkoutdate, 'DY' ) AS checkOutDay, to_char(paydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as paydate,totalprice,dcprice,to_char(rsv_cancledate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rsv_cancledate, fk_roomtype_idx,roomname ,roommainimg,roomtel,roompost,roomsigungu,roomsido,roombname,cleanpay,basic_person, rsv_msg,roomcount,bathcount,latitude,longitude,fk_buildtype_detail_idx,roomdetailaddr ,roomtype_name,case when rsv_checkindate > sysdate then 1 else 2 end AS flag from member A join reservation B on A.userid = B.fk_userid join room C on B.fk_roomcode = C.roomcode join roomtype D on C.fk_roomtype_idx = D.roomtype_idx where A.userid = #{loginuser}

select A.userid AS userid, username, email, phone, B.rsvcode AS rsvcode, C.roomcode AS roomcode ,basic_person, guestcount ,babycount,rsv_name,rsv_phone,rsv_email, to_char(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rsv_checkindate, to_char(rsv_checkindate, 'DAY' ) AS checkInDay, to_char(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as rsv_checkoutdate, to_char(rsv_checkoutdate, 'DAY' ) AS checkOutDay, to_char(paydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as paydate, to_char(rsv_cancledate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rsv_cancledate ,totalprice, dcprice, cleanpay,roomprice, fk_roomtype_idx,roomname ,roommainimg, roomtel ,roompost, roomsigungu, roomsido, roombname,roomdetailaddr,latitude,longitude ,rsv_msg,roomcount,bathcount ,roomtype_name,buildtype_detail_name,buildtype ,nvl(bedcount,0) AS bedcount,nvl(bedtype,'없음') AS bedtype ,case when rsv_checkindate > sysdate then 1 else 2 end AS flag ,(to_date(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') - to_date(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AS dat from member A join reservation B on A.userid = B.fk_userid join room C on B.fk_roomcode = C.roomcode left join roomtype D on C.fk_roomtype_idx = D.roomtype_idx left join BUILDTYPE_DETAIL E on C.fk_buildType_detail_idx = e.buildtype_detail_idx left join BUILDTYPE F on F.BUILDTYPE_IDX = E.FK_BUILDTYPE_IDX left join bedroom G on G.fk_roomcode = C.roomcode left join bed H on G.bedroom_idx = H.fk_bedroom_idx left join BEDOBJ I on I.bedobj_idx = H.fk_bedobj_idx where A.userid = #{userid} and rsvcode= #{rsvcode}

select A.rsvcode,A.fk_roomcode,A.fk_userid,latitude,longitude,roomname,roomsido,roomsigungu,roombname from reservation A join room B on A.fk_roomcode = B.roomcode where A.rsvcode like #{rsvcode} and A.fk_userid like #{userid}

select A.review_idx,B.roomname,B.roomcode,B.fk_userid AS host_userid,A.correct, A.communicate,A.clean,A.position,A.checkin,A.value ,A.review_content,A.hostanswer,to_char(A.review_writedate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS review_writedate
from review A join room B on B.roomcode = A.fk_roomcode where A.fk_userid = #{userid} order by review_idx desc

select review_idx,roomname,roomcode,host_userid,write_userid,correct,communicate,clean,position,checkin,value ,review_content,hostanswer,review_writedate,AVG from ( select A.review_idx,B.roomname,B.roomcode,A.fk_userid AS write_userid,B.fk_userid AS host_userid,A.correct, A.communicate,A.clean,A.position,A.checkin,A.value ,A.review_content,A.hostanswer,to_char(A.review_writedate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS review_writedate , trunc((correct+communicate+clean+position+checkin+value)/6,1) as AVG from review A join room B on B.roomcode = A.fk_roomcode ) where host_userid = #{userid} order by review_idx
mapper.update: update member set email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, post=#{post}, addr= #{addr}, detailaddr=#{detailAddr}, introduction=#{introduction}, profileimg=#{profileimg} where userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: select rsvcode,V.fk_userid,rsv_checkindate,rsv_checkoutdate,roomname,B.roomcode from ( select rsvcode,fk_userid,to_char(rsv_checkindate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rsv_checkindate,to_char(rsv_checkoutdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS rsv_checkoutdate,fk_roomcode from reservation where fk_userid = #{userid} and not fk_roomcode in (select fk_roomcode from review where fk_userid=#{userid}) )V left join room B on V.fk_roomcode = B.roomcode order by rsvcode desc
mapper.update: update reservation set rsv_cancledate = sysdate where fk_userid = #{userid} and rsvcode = #{rsvcode}
